extendedInfo.description: White Tiger is under water and you can feel the water!! An interactive Live Wallpaper which will create water effect on the screen with every touch. The most realistic water ripples makes you think that your screen is made of water.The wallpaper uses OpenGL graphics engine to render images.White Tiger is an absolute delight to watch.Instructions:Home -> Menu -> Wallpapers -> Live Wallpapers -> White TigerDisclaimer: We have found a new way to monetize this app. This app may generate ads in the notification bar.
